## Probability in R
# 1.1 sets
$A=\{a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h\} ,$
$B=\{d,e,f,g,h,i,j\}$ then 
$A\cap B={d,e,f,g,h}$ ,
$A\cup B=\{a,b,c,d,f,g,h,i,j\}$


```{r cars}
A<-letters[1:8]
B<-letters[4:10]
intersect(A,B)
union(A,B)
```
# binomial distribution 
```{r}
x<-rbinom(1000,10,0.5)
plot(x)

```
